intents.name: Corona
questions: What are Coronaviruses?
What are Coronaviruses
What are covid-19?
What are covid-19
What do you know about coronavirus
what is corona virus
what is corona virus?
answers: Coronaviruses (CoV) are a large family of viruses causing illnesses ranging from the common cold to pneumonia (a more severe lung infection). COVID-19 is the infectious disease caused by a strain of coronavirus, SARS-CoV-2. It was declared a pandemic by the World Health Organization in March 2020 and has spread globally.

intents.name: Covid-19 Symptoms
questions: What are the symptoms of covid-19?
What are the symptoms of covid-19
What are the symptoms of coronavirus
What are the symptoms of coronavirus?
answers: The symptoms of COVID-19 infection are similar to that of an acute respiratory infection or pneumonia. These symptoms include fever, cough, runny nose, sore throat, loss of taste or smell.

intents.name: Covid-19 treatments
questions: What is the treatment for COVID-19?
What is the treatment for COVID-19
What is the treatment for coronavirus
What is the treatment for coronavirus?
What are the treatment for coronavirus?
What are the treatment for covid?
treatment of covid19
treatment of coronavirus
treatment of coronavirus?
treatment of covid-19?
treatments of covid-19?
treatments of covid-19
answers: COVID-19 is generally managed with supportive treatment provided based on the patient’s clinical condition. Treatments and drugs for COVID-19 continue to be monitored, and recommendations may further evolve over time.

intents.name: See doctor
questions: Do I have to see a doctor?
Do I have to see a doctor
Do I need see a doctor
Do I need see a doctor?
Do I need see a doctor daily?
Do I need see a doctor monthly?
Do I need see a doctor yearly?
Do I need see a doctor yearly
Do I need see a doctor monthly
Do I need see a doctor daily
Can I refuse to see doctor
Can I refuse to see doctor?
Is it necessary to see doctor regularly?
Is it necessary to see doctor regularly
answers: Most people don't go to the doctor unless they're sick or have a problem. But you should start by seeing your doctor when you're well. By seeing your doctor routinely, you can stay on top of your health
